mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUBSTR(MAX(REP_NO),7,5),0)+1 AS MAX_REP_NO , MAX(REP_NO) AS REP_NO FROM RAB01B WHERE REP_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m'), '%')
SELECT ENTP_CD , CORP_NO , ENTP_NM , CORP_SCL_CD , IND_TYP_DVD_CD , AFL_CMP_NM , CRDT_GRD_CD , MKT_LSTD_CD FROM RAB01A WHERE 1=1 AND ENTP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entpNm},'%')

SELECT REP_FILE_ATT_SQ , REP_NO , SV_FILE_PATH_NM , SV_FILE_NM , ORG_FILE_NM , RGST_DT FROM RAB04B WHERE REP_NO = #{repNo} AND DLT_F = 'N'
AND REP_FILE_ATT_SQ IN
${repFileAttSq}
ORDER BY REP_FILE_ATT_SQ
